nodes.name: Pr
nodes.clashcode:
f_Pr :: Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr
f_Pr firecounter phase = res
  where
    res = firecounter

nodes.name: Int
nodes.function: lambda x, y, clockcount, firecount: ([x[0] + y[0]], [x[0] + y[0]])
nodes.clashcode:
f_Int :: Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr -> (Cntr, Cntr)
f_Int x y firecounter phase = (res, res)
  where
    res = x + y

nodes.name: Cr
nodes.clashcode:
f_Cr :: Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr -> ()
f_Cr x firecounter phase = res
  where
    res = ()
